targets.rawSql:
select timestamp, state
from qss
where entity_id = 'weather.forecast_home'

select timestamp, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_sen55_nox'
sample by 1m

select timestamp, entity_id, json_extract(attributes, '$.uv_index')::float
from qss
where entity_id = 'weather.forecast_home'

select timestamp, state
from qss
where entity_id = 'weather.forecast_home'

select timestamp, cast(state as int)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_co2'

select timestamp, cast(state as int)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_co2'

select timestamp, cast(state as int)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_sen55_voc'

select timestamp, state
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_voc_quality'

select timestamp, entity_id, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_10_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_1_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_2_5_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_4_m_weight_concentration'
sample by 1m;

select timestamp, entity_id, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_10_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_1_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_2_5_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_4_m_weight_concentration'
sample by 1m;

select timestamp, entity_id, cast(state as double) as val
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_1_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_2_5_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_4_m_weight_concentration'
  or entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_pm_10_m_weight_concentration'
latest on timestamp partition by entity_id

select timestamp, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_sen55_humidity'

select timestamp, entity_id, json_extract(attributes, '$.humidity')::float
from qss
where entity_id = 'weather.forecast_home'

select timestamp, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_sen55_humidity'

select timestamp, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_sen55_temperature'

select timestamp, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_sen55_temperature'

select timestamp, entity_id, json_extract(attributes, '$.current_temperature')::float
from qss
where entity_id = 'climate.ethan'

select timestamp, entity_id, json_extract(attributes, '$.temperature')::float
from qss
where entity_id = 'weather.forecast_home'

select timestamp, entity_id, json_extract(attributes, '$.pressure')::float
from qss
where entity_id = 'weather.forecast_home'

select timestamp, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_dps310_pressure'

select timestamp, cast(state as double)
from qss
where entity_id = 'sensor.apollo_air_1_0ec7e0_dps310_pressure'
